text: No - in the UK it's co-codamol 8/500. Which is codeine and paracetamol. Whereas percocet is oxycodone and acetaminophen. One of those is the same (acetaminophen=paracetamol), but the other is very different. Recall that oxycodone is probably about 20x stronger than codeine...
